F

from(Config) - Static method in class software.leonov.config.OptionalConfig
Creates a new OptionalConfig from the underlying Config object.

G

getBoolean(String) - Method in class software.leonov.config.OptionalConfig

I

isStrictMode() - Method in class software.leonov.config.OptionalConfig
Returns whether or not strict-mode is enabled.

O

OptionalConfig - Class in software.leonov.config
This class offers users a better way to handle optional properties in the configuration library Typesafe Config.

S

setStrictMode(boolean) - Method in class software.leonov.config.OptionalConfig
Returns a copy of this OptionalConfig with the specified strict-mode setting.

Core classes and interfaces.
